sense.gloss: to think, to consider, to believe, to reckon
to think (of doing), to plan (to do)
to judge, to assess, to regard
to imagine, to suppose, to dream
to expect, to look forward to
to feel, to be (in a state of mind), to desire, to want
to memorize, to memorise, to commit to memory, to learn by heart, to bear in mind, to remember
to learn, to pick up, to acquire
faint memory, vague memory, dim memory, vague recollection

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓の↑記憶↑↓きおく↓↑力↑↓りょく↓が↑悪↑↓わる↓いのは↑人↑↓ひと↓の↑話↑↓はなし↓を↑聞↑↓き↓く↑習慣↑↓しゅうかん↓がちゃんとできていないからだ。
sdata.e: Your poor memory is due to poor listening habits.

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓すごい↑記憶↑↓きおく↓↑力↑↓りょく↓だね。
↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑記憶↑↓きおく↓↑力↑↓りょく↓もいい。
sdata.e: She has a good memory, too.

sdata.j: ↑記憶↑↓きおく↓↑力↑↓りょく↓が↑衰↑↓おとろ↓えました。
↑記憶↑↓きおく↓のよさが↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑武器↑↓ぶき↓である。
sdata.e: A good memory is his weapon.

sdata.j: ↑記憶↑↓きおく↓にまだ↑新↑↓あたら↓しい。
sdata.e: It is still fresh in my memory.

sdata.j: もう↑少↑↓すこ↓し↑記憶↑↓きおく↓↑力↑↓りょく↓がよければなあ。
sdata.e: I wish I had a better memory.

sdata.j: ニューヨークの１９８７↑年↑↓ねん↓↑１０月↑↓じゅうがつ↓の↑株式↑↓かぶしき↓↑大↑↓だい↓↑暴落↑↓ぼうらく↓はまだ↑生々↑↓なまなま↓しく↑記憶↑↓きおく↓されている。
sdata.e: The stock market crash of October 1987 in New York is still vividly remembered.

sdata.j: それは↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑記憶↑↓きおく↓に↑残↑↓のこ↓っている。
それに↑関↑↓かん↓する↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑記憶↑↓きおく↓は↑今↑↓いま↓も↑鮮↑↓あざ↓やかに↑残↑↓のこ↓っている。
sdata.e: My memory of that is still vivid.

words.gloss: to think, to consider, to believe, to reckon
to memorize, to memorise, to commit to memory, to learn by heart, to bear in mind, to remember
